name: Beddy Butler
body:
### Beddy Butler

Beddy butler is a small applet utility for OS X. It is designed to help nudge you to go to bed rather than stay awake on your computer. 

![](https://github.com/NellWatson/beddybutlerpub/blob/master/images/BBPREFS.png?raw=true)

### Usage

Setup:
You can change the following settings:

- Set a time frame for your desired time to prepare to go to bed (e.g. 10:30 - 11:00)
- Choose your applet behaviour from a set of butlers: Shy, Insistent and Zombie.
- You are also be able to preview each butler sound
- Configure whether you would like the applet to launch at login (this setting will be ON by default)
- Tell it 'Not Now Old Chap' to silence the app for that evening.

### License
This applet is freely available under the BSD license. Please feel free to contribute to enhance it and modify it.

### Authors and Contributors
From David Garces (@gbdavid2), and Nell Watson (@nellwatson), inspired by a talk from Abe Gong (@abegong).

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with Beddy Butler? Please [contact support](http://www.nellwatson.com/about/) and weâ€™ll help you figure it out.
